page.title: 04A TYPICAL SUNDAY--RACHEL
page.content: {9.00}I get up and usually have cereal and toast for breakfast.The cereal I usually have for breakfast is Start or Weetabix.{10.00}I usually go to the shops after breakfast to get the vegetables for dinner.{11.00}We make cakes around this time for Sunday tea.{12.30}I help make the dinner. {13.30}We have dinner,a Sunday roast. {14.00} Watch "The East Enders" on t.v.{15.00}My brother and I go out to play with our friends{18.30}I come in for tea, which is sandwiches and cakes.{19.30}I go out to watch cricket on the village cricket pitch.{20.30}I have a shower.{21.30}I go to bed.
